mapper.insert:
SELECT TTY_IC_MAIL_RECORD_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL id FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO tty_ic_mail_record(ID,MAIL_ID,RECEIVE_USER_ID,RECEIVE_MAIL,RECEIVE_TYPE,READ_FLAG,REPLY_FLAG,READ_DATE,REMIND_FLAG,RECOVER_DATE,STAR_MAIL,FOLDER_ID,DELETE_FLAG,CREATE_USER,CREATE_USER_DEPT,CREATE_USER_ORG,CREATE_DATE,MODIFY_USER,MODIFY_DATE,EXT_DATE1,EXT_DATE2,EXT_NUM1,EXT_NUM2,EXT_NUM3,EXT_STR1,EXT_STR2,EXT_STR3,EXT_STR4,EXT_STR5) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{mailId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{receiveUserId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{receiveMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{receiveType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{readFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{replyFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{readDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{remindFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{recoverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{starMail,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{folderId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserDept,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserOrg,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifyUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extNum1,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum2,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum3,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extStr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE tty_ic_mail_record
MAIL_ID = #{mailId},
RECEIVE_USER_ID = #{receiveUserId},
RECEIVE_MAIL = #{receiveMail},
RECEIVE_TYPE = #{receiveType},
READ_FLAG = #{readFlag},
REPLY_FLAG = #{replyFlag},
READ_DATE = #{readDate},
REMIND_FLAG = #{remindFlag},
RECOVER_FLAG = #{recoverFlag},
RECOVER_DATE = #{recoverDate},
STAR_MAIL = #{starMail},
FOLDER_ID = #{folderId},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}

UPDATE tty_ic_mail_record
REPLY_FLAG = #{replyFlag},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and DELETE_FLAG = 0
and RECEIVE_USER_ID = #{receiveUserId}
